description:
Cheren is currently the Gym Leader of Aspertia Gym. He is the main rival of the protagonist in Pokémon Black and White games but later becomes the Aspertia Gym Leader in the Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 games.
He was first seen in the anime as a gym leader in the promotional video for Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 battling against the female protagonist.
name: Cheren
